attributes.action: wear a wedding dress in support of Wedding Dress Day on Friday 17 August 2007 for which we, the undersigned, will sponsor him £1. We will each promise to donate personally that said sum to a charity of his choice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This year's Wedding Dress Day is on Friday 17 August. Women -- and men! -- are getting sponsored for wearing their wedding outfit to work, the supermarket, at a party, or any other event of their choice. Money raised will be donated to charity. We ask Gordon Brown to join in.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
